content.rendered:
• Wet beauty blender with water.
  • Squeeze using a paper towel if available to get red of access water
  • Bounce foundation, powder, or any other complexion product across the face for flawless results.
  • Use the pointed top to contour and sculpt, the flat edge for foundation application to larger areas of the face with a flawless finish.
  • Cleanse after each use to help maintain your beauty Sponge
  • Ensure to Replace your beauty blender every three months.

<title>J Beauty Blender (Super Soft) - jbeauty</title>
<meta name="description" content="2X times softer than the usual beauty blender!Flawless application of cream or liquid products on the facePerfect for foundation application and contouring.Great for adding highlight and blush to different areas of the face.It’s unique shape allows the blender to be used for many different products and easy to grip.J Beauty Blender (Super Soft) rivals the beauty industry’s leading makeup blender brand and is the ultimate sponge tool for all liquid, cream and powder products. This sponge provides a flawless, airbrushed finish without streaking or blotchiness." />

This sponge provides a flawless, airbrushed finish without streaking or blotchiness.
